history.narrative: Law 2-155 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-241, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 28, 1978 and December 12, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 1978, it was assigned Act. No. 2-322 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
